enhanced_description: Founded in 2016, Chrono.tech is a Sydney-based fintech company specializing in blockchain-powered HR software solutions. Emerging from a 2016 token sale, its innovative suite of tools aims to revolutionize job access, contractor engagement, recruitment, invoicing, and payments. Key offerings include LaborX, a global recruitment platform enabling crypto payments; TimeX, a Plasma-based exchange merging centralized and decentralized technologies for speed, security, and cost-efficiency; and PaymentX, an automated cryptocurrency payroll solution for businesses. Chrono.tech's ecosystem also allows users to lock their TIME tokens in the TimeWarp smart contract for rewards, and access Job Mining and Premium Account status on LaborX, collectively streamlining processes, cutting costs, and enhancing reliability for diverse sectors.
